alert.note: Alert for Charles City; City of Newport News; City of Williamsburg; Gloucester; James City; King and Queen; New Kent; Prince George; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 5:19PM EDT until September 25 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GLOUCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN KING AND QUEEN... SOUTHEASTERN CHARLES CITY...NORTHEASTERN PRINCE GEORGE...NORTHWESTERN YORK...SOUTHEASTERN NEW KENT...JAMES CITY...AND NORTHERN SURRY COUNTIES...THE NORTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS AND THE CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG... At 518 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Barhamsville to Rustic to near Cabin Point, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Toano and Barhamsville around 525 PM EDT. Williamsburg and Norge around 530 PM EDT. College Of William And Mary, Kings Point, York Terrace, Carver Gardens and Busch Gardens around 535 PM EDT. Newport News, Queens Lake, Grove and Lee Hall around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Taylors Corner, Chickahominy Shore, Croaker, Chippokes State Park, Camp Peary, Spring Grove, Lanexa, Ewell, Warren Mill and Allmondsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; City of Newport News; City of Williamsburg; Gloucester; James City; King and Queen; New Kent; Prince George; Surry; York
